title: Shift
description: Eliza Levitt, barefaced rebel and social reject, thinks she's seen it all. The isolation, the backstreet confrontations and animosity of her classmates are part of everyday life. Then one night normality disintegrates before her eyes. After being whisked off to a parallel universe, Eliza discovers she is able to create and control one of the six elements at will. But this incredible power comes at a price, taking the form of the charismatic but iniquitous Shadow Runner who seems to know a lot more about her than anyone else, including Eliza herself. After narrowly escaping death at the hands of his hitman, she realizes her fight for survival is only just beginning.
author: Dekka Nye
